name: Burst Scan
description:
Before either side chooses their action: If your side has Dendro Cores or Bountiful Cores, their Usages are decreased by 1, and Discard 1 card from the top of your deck. After this, deal Dendro DMG equal to the Elemental Dice Cost of the discarded card.
Usages: 1 (Can stack. Max 3 stacks)
